This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ACADEMIC-WRITING-RIG.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-25T10:32:32Z Liv Gunnhild Qvale 2015-02-25T10:32:23+00:00 2015-02-25T10:32:23+00:00 Registration open: The Art and Science of Improvisation, June 2015, Norway https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-WRITING-RIG;9a0981b.1502 The registration is now open for the international research Summer School<br><br>The Art and Science of Improvisation<br><br>Location: Stord/Haugesund University College, Stord, Norway<br><br>Dates: 8th-12th June 2015<br><br>This Summer School is a collaboration between the two research schools NAFOL and Grieg Research School (GRS), and the hosting institution Stord/Haugesund University College (HSH).<br><br>The Summer School will offer a range of stimulating activities, workshops and presentations in addition to the specific GRS course. [...] Liv Gunnhild Qvale 2014-12-16T08:27:11+00:00 2014-12-16T08:27:11+00:00 The Art and Science of Improvisation: Research Summer School, June 2015, Norway https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-WRITING-RIG;4d389ab7.1412 We would like to invite you to participate in an international research Summer School<br><br>The Art and Science of Improvisation<br><br>Location: Stord/Haugesund University College, Stord, Norway<br><br>Dates: 8th-12th June 2015<br><br>This Summer School is a collaboration between the two research schools NAFOL and Grieg Research School (GRS), and the hosting institution Stord/Haugesund University College (HSH). [...] Liv Gunnhild Qvale 2014-09-15T11:04:41+00:00 2014-09-15T11:04:41+00:00 November 2014: Method course; Data Collection, Interpretation and Analysis, University of Bergen - Norway https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-WRITING-RIG;e0f15165.1409 [cid:image004.png@01CFD0E5.9BC8A5A0]<br><br>Grieg Research School in Interdisciplinary Music Studies (GRS) invites Ph.D. candidates and other researchers to the autumn 2014 course. This course will focus on methods and methodology as related to the collection of data material and the analysis of data material.<br><br>The Study of Musical Experiences: Data Collection, Interpretation and Analysis [...]
